entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Overwinter Survival
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º9,99 â†’ â‚º2,99 [â‚º2,99 ~ â‚º9,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º2,99

In-App Purchases

  • Standard Packï¼šâ‚º4,99
  • Elite Packï¼šâ‚º59,99
  • Advanced Packï¼šâ‚º19,99
  • Premium Packï¼šâ‚º34,99

Application Description

Overwinter Survival is a card-based survival game in which you are stranded on the glaciers of Greenland. The cold and loneliness ensnare you after your plane breaks down for an unknown reason, leaving you crashed on Greenland's glaciers and seeking shelter at a nearby cabin. Now you must hunt, craft tools and items, and keep your stove fueled to survive in the cold. In Overwinter Survival, you must use the cards you're dealt to stay alive. You can only use one card per round. With Lady Luck at the helm, no two journeys will be the same. Fish in the glaciers, hunt with your spear and craft an axe at your workshop to become a lumberjack. To get out of this frozen hell and see your family once again, you must stay alive and repair your plane. Experience a unique journey each time you play with randomly generated card decks and test your survival skills while pushing your luck amidst the frozen glaciers.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º179,99 â†’ â‚º99,99 [â‚º99,99 ~ â‚º179,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º99,99

In-App Purchases

  • DLC "The Card Game"ï¼šâ‚º179,99
  • TeaSet DarkLord Skin Package Cï¼šâ‚º229,99
  • Teaset Dark Lord Skin PackageBï¼šâ‚º229,99
  • Teaset DarkLord Skin Package Aï¼šâ‚º229,99
  • Little Corr. Hero costume Packï¼šâ‚º1.199,99
  • Little Hero Costume Packageï¼šâ‚º1.199,99
  • Black Dark Lord Skin Packageï¼šâ‚º349,99
  • White Dark Lord Skin Packageï¼šâ‚º349,99
  • Awakening Viper Packageï¼šâ‚º229,99
  • Myth full packï¼šâ‚º1.799,99

Application Description

Prepare for battle - a mob of heroes is about to invade your territory! Build traps facilities in your dungeon, hire monsters, discover relics with mysterious power, and protect your dungeon from heroes that came to take you down. â—† CONTENTS - 9 Dark Lords with special skills! - 300+ monsters and heroes - 100+ traps and facilities for your dungeon - 200+ relics with mysterious power - Various EVENTS filled with surprises - Various elements that can be unlocked throughout gameplay - and moreâ€¦! We are planning to add more Dark Lords, traps, monsters, and more game modes! â—† CREATE YOUR OWN DUNGEON Think carefully when placing traps, facilities, and monsters into your dungeon. Strong strategy will help you survive the swarm of heroes and allow you to unlock more elements for your dungeon. May your dungeon endure the bravest heroes there are! â—† EXPLORE YOUR FATE Choose your fate from a selection of fate cards every day. If you wish to battle, heroes will come, and if you wish for surprises, a special event will take place. Choose the fate you want as the master of your dungeon. -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DayCost Pro - Personal Finance
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º129,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º129,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget. Look at other people how to say: â— I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more. â— Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app. â— It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money. â— Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really. â— I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app! Apple Watch: You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month. Featureï¼š â— Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category â— iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen â— Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data â— Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates â— Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster â— Full gestures: fast billing basic â— Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand â— iCloud backup & restore â— Dropbox backup & restore â— Export data to CSV via Email â— Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options. â— Allow custom theme color and wallpaper. â— Allow add transaction from template. Basicï¼š â— Expense & Income bills can be added photos â— Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have â— Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week â— Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption â— A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize â— Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs â— Supports iPhone & iPad â— Daily reminder Increaseï¼š â— Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly â— You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency If you give up because of difficulties If you give up because of busy If you want to know where expenses If you want to save money If ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ Try our "DayCost" it, she will be your best assistant URL Schemes: DayCost:// Help translate DayCost: Contribute to the DayCost translation in your language. Let's make DayCost available to everyone in the world! We will show translator's info in DayCost, if you so desire. In addition, we also give several redemption code as a gift. have any suggestions or comments, please write to usï¼šsupport@daycost.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
